thread.title: Pensioner dies after mobility scooter crash in Southampton
thread.title_full: Pensioner dies after mobility scooter crash in Southampton

title: Pensioner dies after mobility scooter crash in Southampton
text:
Borat Sagdiev 5:12pm Fri 2 Oct 15 Borat Sagdiev wrote… There is absolutely nothing wrong with this road - it is straight and you have to be absolutely useless to have a crash there. We may as well put up cameras on every road because idiot drivers aren't restricted just to major routes. I feel sorry for the old man. That crossing should be improved because it is not pedestrian friendly at all. 
The problem with this road is that it is wide but not wide enough for two vehicles without the overtaking vehicle crossing the central line.Only today I came face to face with a van who was over taking on the other side.The fact that it is a straight road is also against it as people do speed.It narrows after the junctions.People who know this will stagger there vehicles so the other doesn't have to suddenly brake or crash to make way .No U turn at the petrol station....I always see people doing this weekly...people are impatient and stupid and only care about themselves and that makes for a dangerous road.
